post_title: Ed Walsh (Portrait) - T206 Piedmont 150 Factory 25 - SGC 1 (Nice Eye Appeal) SOLD
post_content:
T206 Ed Walsh (Portrait)

Piedmont 150 Factory 25 back

Insert the typical "looks great for the grade" verbiage into this description. ;)

Newly graded SGC 1 

SOLD Shipped (in the U.S.)

Wrinkle top right corner. Surface wrinkle on the right shoulder area (looking at the card.) Nearly impossible to see in the scans no matter what settings I use. I've included both the SGC scans, and my own of the card. It's there I assure you.

Tiny bit of paper loss on lower back of card. By the word "Factory", and possibly on the other bottom corner, but not affecting any text.

Pay almost any way you like.

PM to reserve or e-mail me at David at Boxingtreasures dot com

Thanks.
Certainly a nice 1…gl with the sale
